sections.title: Introduction

requirement_evaluations.applicability_reasoning: Gene symbols should be italicized throughout the article.
requirement_evaluations.evidence: The gene symbol AGK appears without italics.
requirement_evaluations.reasoning: The requirement is not met as the gene symbol is not italicized, indicating a complete lack of adherence.
requirement_evaluations.overlap_notes: No overlaps in symbol formatting detected.

requirement_evaluations.applicability_reasoning: The infobox follows the standard template for gene/protein articles.
requirement_evaluations.evidence: A standard infobox_gene template is used.
requirement_evaluations.reasoning: Complete adherence as the standard infobox template is correctly utilized.
requirement_evaluations.overlap_notes: Infobox content supports main article text.

requirement_evaluations.applicability_reasoning: Since this is an introduction, it should logically precede subsequent sections on structure, function, etc.
requirement_evaluations.evidence: As the introductory section, it is logically placed at the beginning.
requirement_evaluations.reasoning: The section adheres to the requirement of being logically organized at the start.
requirement_evaluations.overlap_notes: No significant overlaps due to initial placement.

sections.meta_notes: The section meets the requirements regarding infobox usage and organization but fails to italicize gene symbols properly.
